metadata.dc:author: Martínez, R
Solís, E
Rico, F
Castilla, J M
Gallardo, A
Ramírez, R
metadata.dc:description: A case of myoepithelial adenoma of hard palate minor salivary glands is reported. This is a very rare tumor. Histological, clinical and therapeutical aspects are discussed and a literature review is carried out.
metadata.dc:title: Adenoma mioepitelial de glándula salival menor de paladar.
[Myoepithelial adenoma of palate minor salivary gland].
